alert.note: Alert for Brule; Charles Mix; Gregory (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 6:18PM MDT until June 29 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Charles Mix County in south central South Dakota... Gregory County in south central South Dakota... Southwestern Brule County in south central South Dakota... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 718 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ideal South Housing to near Wewela to Springview, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dallas, Gregory, Burke, Herrick and St. Charles. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
